remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需 XSD 資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < XML 資料類型參考 > 在 MSDN Library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中的成員類別之間進行轉換物件和 XSD`hexBinary`字串。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to convert between a object and an XSD `hexBinary` string.
